channel.title: Mail Subject Plus on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in Mail Subject Plus on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: New and planned
item.description: New and planned Planned functions for future versions Increase length of desired placeholders Preview function Version 2.6.0.0 - 25.08.2023 New features: Extension of Communication matrix by fields: email subject Version 2.5.0.0 - 22.06.2023 Corrections: show subject lines in vendor document layouts Version 2.4.0.0 - 22.05.2023 New features: Improved support of document types from service area Adjustments in license check for use of service area Corrections: Fixed a bug where the wrong record was sometimes pulled from the report selection or document layout.

item.title: First steps
item.description: Getting started with the Connector 365 Mail Subject Plus App. Here you will find all the important information and notes about the trial, installation and purchase of the Connector 365 Mail Subject Plus App. Just use either the bottom or left navigation menu. In case a question could not be answered, we will be happy to help you personally. You can find the necessary contact information on the support page.

item.title: Working with Connector 365 Mail Subject Plus
Videos
item.description: Videos Here you can find some informative videos about our Mail Subject Plus app, each video covers a special topic
